ack.p: The authors thank Prof. Qibin Leng of the Institute Pasteur of Shanghai, Chinese Academy of Sciences for providing the AG6 mice. We would also like to thank the Core Facility and Technical Support, Wuhan Institute of Virology, Chinese Academy of Sciences for Xuefang An's and Fan Zhang's help in the animal experiments. This work was supported by the National Key R&D Program of China (2016YFD0500406 to Hanzhong Wang), National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC) (31800155 to Ting Wang, 81871665 to Yuan Zhang), and Youth Innovation Promotion Association of CAS (2016302 to Zhenhua Zheng).

sec.title: Author Contributions
sec.p: T.W., P.L. J.S, Z.T., Y.M, and D. L. performed the experiments. Y.Z, Z.Z, X.K., Y.L., and F.X performed the data analysis. T.W, P.L, and Z.Z. wrote the initial draft of the manuscript. Z.Z., Q.H., and H.W revised the manuscript. All authors contributed to the editing of the final version of the manuscript.
